articles.author: Alexander Kacala
articles.title: Whataburger thanks employees with $90 million in bonuses - TODAY
articles.description: San Antonio-based burger chain Whataburger has awarded more than $90 million in bonuses to its employees for their service during the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content: San Antonio-based hamburger chain Whataburger has awarded more than $90 million in bonuses to its employees as a thank you for their service during the coronavirus pandemic and severe winter weather … [+1270 chars]
